headline: Which Is the Better Stock to Buy and Hold Forever: Amazon or Costco?
summary: You couldn't have gone wrong buying shares of Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) or Costco Wholesale (NASDAQ: COST) in the two companies' early days.  A $10,000 investment in Costco when the giant wholesaler went public in 1985 would be worth almost $11.9 million today.  If you had bought $10,000 of Amazon's shares after its IPO in 1997 and held them, you'd now have nearly $23.4 million.
